statements: SELECT * FROM network_traffic_logs;
SELECT log_id, source_ip, protocol FROM network_traffic_logs WHERE status_code = 200;
SELECT destination_ip, timestamp FROM network_traffic_logs WHERE source_ip = '192.168.1.1';
SELECT timestamp, status_code FROM network_traffic_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_logs FROM network_traffic_logs WHERE protocol = 'HTTP';
SELECT * FROM network_traffic_logs WHERE protocol = 'HTTP' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT source_ip, destination_ip, status_code FROM network_traffic_logs WHERE status_code >= 400;
SELECT COUNT(*), protocol FROM network_traffic_logs GROUP BY protocol;
SELECT timestamp, source_ip, destination_ip FROM network_traffic_logs WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT AVG(status_code) as avg_status_code FROM network_traffic_logs WHERE protocol = 'FTP';
SELECT * FROM network_traffic_logs;
SELECT id, timestamp, source_ip, destination_ip FROM network_traffic_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT source_ip, COUNT(*) AS total_logs FROM network_traffic_logs GROUP BY source_ip ORDER BY total_logs DESC;
SELECT * FROM network_traffic_logs WHERE destination_ip = '192.168.1.1';
SELECT id, breach_type, description FROM security_breaches ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT id, timestamp, source_ip, destination_ip, message FROM network_traffic_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT source_ip, COUNT(*) AS total_logs FROM network_traffic_logs GROUP BY source_ip ORDER BY total_logs DESC
SELECT * FROM security_breaches WHERE breach_type='DDoS Attack' LIMIT 5

SELECT network_traffic_logs.*, security_breaches.breach_type FROM network_traffic_logs JOIN security_breaches ON network_traffic_logs.id = security_breaches.log_id ORDER BY network_traffic_logs.timestamp DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT source_ip, destination_ip, COUNT(*) AS total_breaches FROM network_traffic_logs LEFT JOIN security_breaches ON network_traffic_logs.id = security_breaches.log_id GROUP BY source_ip, destination_ip HAVING total_breaches > 1
SELECT * FROM network_logs WHERE port = 80;
SELECT source_ip, destination_ip FROM breach_detection WHERE detection_id = 1001;
SELECT timestamp, event_description FROM security_events ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM breach_detection WHERE alert = 'malware detected' AND action_taken = 'quarantine';
SELECT source_ip, COUNT(*) AS total_events FROM security_events GROUP BY source_ip ORDER BY total_events DESC;
SELECT source_ip, destination_ip FROM network_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM security_events WHERE severity = 'High' AND source_ip = '192.168.1.1';
SELECT detection_id, alert, action_taken FROM breach_detection WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT timestamp, event_description FROM security_events WHERE severity = 'Critical' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT source_ip, COUNT(*) AS total_logs FROM network_logs GROUP BY source_ip HAVING total_logs > 100 ORDER BY total_logs DESC;
SELECT * FROM network_traffic_logs;
SELECT log_id, source_ip, destination_ip FROM network_traffic_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT breach_id, breach_type, description FROM security_breaches WHERE breach_type LIKE '%ransomware%';
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT user_id, activity_type, timestamp FROM user_activity ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM network_traffic_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT breach_id, breach_type, description FROM security_breaches WHERE breach_type = 'DDoS' OR breach_type = 'Malware' ORDER BY breach_id;
SELECT log_id, source_ip, destination_ip, protocol FROM network_traffic_logs WHERE protocol = 'HTTP' AND (source_ip = '192.168.1.1' OR destination_ip = '10.0.0.1');
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE role = 'admin' OR role = 'supervisor' ORDER BY username ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT activity_id, user_id, activity_type, timestamp FROM user_activity WHERE activity_type LIKE '%login%' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 20;
SELECT * FROM network_traffic_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT log_id, source_ip, destination_ip FROM network_traffic_logs WHERE protocol = 'HTTP';
SELECT breach_type, breach_severity, detected_on FROM potential_breaches WHERE breach_severity > 5;
SELECT detail_description FROM breach_details WHERE detected_by = 'Security Team';
SELECT admin_name, admin_email FROM security_admins ORDER BY admin_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM network_traffic_logs WHERE protocol = 'HTTP' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT breach_type, breach_severity FROM potential_breaches WHERE detected_on >= '2022-01-01' AND detected_on <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT detail_description, detected_by FROM breach_details WHERE action_taken LIKE '%quarantine%';
SELECT admin_name, admin_email FROM security_admins ORDER BY admin_name ASC;
SELECT log_id, source_ip, destination_ip, bytes_transferred FROM network_traffic_logs WHERE bytes_transferred > 100000 ORDER BY bytes_transferred DESC;
